summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing their whereabouts and plans. Epstein mentions he is still in New York, while Staley is upstate with Tim Collins. The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and legal notices regarding the communication.
